author: Natalie Andrews
title: Pelosi Urges Democrats to Run on Economic Issues—Not Simply on Trump—in Midterms
text:
WASHINGTON—House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi said Tuesday that she is urging Democrats to focus on infrastructure projects, better-paying jobs and rolling back Republican tax cuts in the midterm elections—and not to run simply as opposition to President Donald Trump.
“It comes down to an economic message,” the California Democrat said in an interview hosted by Politico. “The financial instability of American families is something that needs to be addressed.”
...
